body: In a city that is constantly struggling to reduce crime and improve the quality of life, few have noticed a bedeviling problem on the city's edges: Jet Ski theft. This evil has not gone ignored by city, state and federal authorities, however. Yesterday, some of the city's top law enforcers announced that they had smashed a network of Jet Ski
title: 55 Indicted in Jet Ski Thefts and Resale

body: She talks like your typical teen-ager, sprinkling her conversation with ''awesome'' and ''like, you know'' and ''whatever.'' She listens to CD's by Dave Matthews and U2. She likes hanging out with friends. But when Barbara Wexelman, 18, graduates tomorrow from Stuyvesant High School, she will have a most atypical item on her list of activities:
title: At the Board; A young and muted voice on New York City's school board.

title: NEIGHBORHOOD REPORT: BROOKLYN UP CLOSE; Greenpoint to Sheepshead Bay: When the Boards Meet

body: ATTRACTIONS Museums and Sites ALICE AUSTEN HOUSE, 2 Hylan Boulevard, Rosebank, Staten Island. This 17th-century farmhouse, converted in the 19th century to a Victorian cottage, was the home of the photographer Alice Austen. On view is her parlor, filled with period furniture. Hours: Thursdays through Sundays, noon to 5 P.M.; closed today.
title: SPARE TIMES
